title: CryptoCoin.News
text:
Overview

The team are airdropping $1,000,000 worth of coins to participants who complete easy social tasks. Token is traded on top exchanges.

0–3000 users GET 2 USD

3001–9000 users GET 1.5 USD

9001–1 000 000 users GET 1 USD

What we like most about the project is that it’s community-driven, especially in the crypto sphere because the adoption and the usage is the most important for every coin. This non-profit organization is rated among the top 10 ICOs of 2018 by Cryptospace. The whitepaper and the team are also great.
